schedule = {}

schedule["Kitchen"] = {
    "DailySchedules": [
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 0,
            "Switchpoints": [
                {"heatSetpoint": 19.0, "TimeOfDay": "06:30:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "09:00:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 19.0, "TimeOfDay": "17:30:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "23:00:00"},
            ],
        },
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 1,
            "Switchpoints": [
                {"heatSetpoint": 19.0, "TimeOfDay": "06:30:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "09:00:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 19.0, "TimeOfDay": "17:30:00"},
                {"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "23:00:00"},

schedule["Hall"] = {
    "DailySchedules": [
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 0,
            "Switchpoints": [{"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "00:00:00"}],
        },
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 1,
            "Switchpoints": [{"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "00:00:00"}],
        },
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 2,
            "Switchpoints": [{"heatSetpoint": 16.0, "TimeOfDay": "00:00:00"}],
        },
        {
            "DayOfWeek": 3,
